Chapter 1 Introduction 1.1 Including Code 1.2 Including Plots

Chapter 1 Introduction Here I introduce my totally awesome book. 1.1 Including Code You can include R code in the document as follows: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.:19.0 3rd Qu.: 56.00 ## Max. :25.0 Max. :120.00 1.2 Including Plots You can also embed plots, for example: Figure 1.1: A figure caption for this awesome figure Note that the echo = FALSE parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot. As shown in Figure 1.1.
